definition: (also uṭṭhāpayati and uṭṭhāpeti) makes get up, rouses; makes rise, lifts, erects; makes appear, produces, lets rise, appear
stands up, gets up; springs up, arises; comes forth, appears; rouses oneself, is alert; escapes, moves away; recovers (from sickness)
one who rouses himself, is energetic
one who rouses himself, is energetic
stood up, got up; sprung up, arose; came forth, appeared
rising, getting up; arising, appearance; erection; exertion, effort
(also uṭṭhapeti and uṭṭhāpeti) makes get up, rouses; makes rise, lifts, erects; makes appear, produces, lets rise, appear
